Class ShibbolethIdpMetadataAndCertificatesGenerationService

  • java.lang.Object

public class ShibbolethIdpMetadataAndCertificatesGenerationService
extends java.lang.Object
implements SamlIdpMetadataAndCertificatesGenerationService
    A metadata generator based on the Shibboleth IdP's MetadataGenerator.

    4.3.0
